reviewText:
For all you CHRISTIAN THE LION fans, this is it!  The original movie.
I loved watching it. Awesome true story.

Make sure you buy this series with this one on it:

Christian The Lion ("The Lion At World's End") (UK-1971) - Bill Travers/Virginia McKenna/George Adamson

Among the critters in the KIDS' FAVORITE ANIMAL MOVIES 10 pack are dogs, horses, a mountain lion and a wolf. One film is by the same folks who did BORN FREE, and another has a famous Hollywood pooch in it. These ten animal-themed features are sure to be favorites of the whole family for years to come. Also from BRENTWOOD is another family-oriented movie 10 pack, KIDS' FAVORITE ADVENTURE MOVIES. . The following alphabetized program list provides viewer poll ratings for each film (based on a 1 to 10 scale), plus original theatrical titles (where indicated), country of origin (if other than USA), years of release and principal actors. (6.1) Adventures Of Gallant Bess (1948) - Cameron Mitchell/Audrey Long/Fuzzy Knight (5.4) The Big Cat (1949) - Lon McCallister/Peggy Ann Garner/Forrest Tucker (6.8) Christian The Lion ("The Lion At World's End") (UK-1971) - Bill Travers/Virginia McKenna/George Adamson (6.5) George (USA/Switzerland-1972) - Marshall Thompson/Jack Mullaney/Linda Carroll (???) Lil' Scratch - (no data available) (5.3) Mooch Goes To Hollywood (TV-1971) - Vincent Price/James Darren/Jill St. John/Jim Backus (4.2) Paco (Colombia/USA-1976) - José Ferrer/Allen Garfield/Pernell Roberts (3.9) The Painted Hills (1951) - Paul Kelly/Bruce Cowling/Gary Gray/Lassie (5.7) The Red Fury (1984) - Wendy Lynne/Calvin Bartlett/Alan Hale Jr./Will Jordan (minor role) (4.6) White Fang To The Rescue (Italy-1974) - Henry Silva/Maurizio Merli/Donald O'Brien
